design.background: Dark radial gradient (ink black #0B0B0D to purple-pink tint), faint nightlife photo at 10% opacity

header.bar: Black semi-transparent strip 90-100px tall at top

accents: Spotlight glow effect behind headline (radial gradient)
Small arrow icon (30px, gold/white) on far right edge at mid-height
Large translucent GettUpp ENT wordmark watermark at 5-10% opacity
